projects.title: Enterprise E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A scalable e-commerce solution for multi-vendor businesses featuring real-time inventory sync, custom admin dashboards, and advanced analytics. Integrated with Stripe and PayPal for seamless payments and built with Laravel and React.

projects.title: Task Management & Collaboration Suite
projects.description: A real-time collaborative task management application supporting Kanban boards, team chat, drag-and-drop task assignment, and performance analytics. Designed for agile teams with WebSocket-powered live updates.

projects.title: Corporate Financial Website
projects.description: Developed a fully customized WordPress website for a UK-based financial services firm. Integrated content automation tools, SEO optimization, and custom dashboards for content editors.

projects.title: Dynamic Portfolio Generator (SaaS)
projects.description: A Next.js-based SaaS platform allowing users to create and deploy their own portfolios instantly. Includes user authentication, live preview editing, and automated deployment via Vercel API.

projects.title: Learning Management System (LMS)
projects.description: A robust LMS platform with instructor dashboards, student progress tracking, course analytics, and real-time assessments. Supports subscription-based access and integrates Redis for caching and notifications.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A unified social media management system that connects multiple platforms (Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) and visualizes engagement data in real-time with beautiful analytics charts and reports.

projects.title: AI-Powered Resume Analyzer
projects.description: An AI SaaS tool that scans resumes, extracts keywords, and provides job-fit scoring using NLP. Built with Python backend (FastAPI), React frontend, and integrated OpenAI API for semantic analysis.

projects.title: Real-Time Vehicle Tracking Platform
projects.description: An enterprise-level GPS tracking platform built for logistics companies to monitor fleets in real time. Features geofencing, route optimization, and live driver dashboards with Google Maps integration.
